# SPEC-08 Adventure Card: Swarm Architecture Synthesis

**Generated by**: 5-Agent Architect Swarm
**Date**: 2025-12-26
**Agents**: Conversion, Mobile/Field, Storytelling, Information Architecture, Differentiation

---

## Executive Summary

The current AdventureCard is **technically sound but emotionally flat**. It displays data correctly but misses the storytelling opportunity that makes WVWO unique. The swarm identified 5 key enhancements that transform the card from "outdoor website" to "advice from Kim."

---

## The Unified Vision: "Kim's Field Guide Card"

```
+------------------------------------------------------------------+
|  [IMAGE - 4:3, evocative not stock]                              |
|                                                                  |
|  +--------------------+                    +------------------+  |
|  | 25 min from shop   |                    | MODERATE         |  |
|  +--------------------+                    +------------------+  |
|         ‚Üë Proximity (sign-green)               ‚Üë Difficulty     |
+------------------------------------------------------------------+
|  WMA  Burnsville Lake WMA                                        |
|  ~~~  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~                                        |
|  ‚ÜëType   ‚Üë Location (muted, anchor)                              |
+------------------------------------------------------------------+
|  Spring Gobbler Season                     ‚Üê Title (font-display)|
+------------------------------------------------------------------+
|  "Toms gobble here til mid-May"            ‚Üê Kim's Hook (font-   |
|                                               hand, orange)      |
+------------------------------------------------------------------+
|  [ü¶É Turkey] [‚õ∞Ô∏è Moderate] [üìÖ Spring]     ‚Üê Quick Scan Icons    |
+------------------------------------------------------------------+
|  [üêï Dog-Friendly]                         ‚Üê Suitability         |
+------------------------------------------------------------------+
```

---

## 5 Key Enhancements (Swarm Consensus)

### 1. PROXIMITY BADGE: "25 min from shop"
**Source**: Conversion + Storytelling Architects

| Why | Implementation |
|-----|----------------|
| Anchors every adventure to the physical store | Top-left badge, sign-green |
| Reinforces "stop by before you head out" | Format: "25 min" (not "25 minutes") |
| Drives foot traffic (strategic goal) | Calculate from shop: 38.8106, -80.6492 |

```tsx
<span className="bg-sign-green text-white text-xs font-bold px-2 py-1 rounded-sm">
  {adventure.data.drive_time} from shop
</span>
```

---

### 2. KIM'S HOOK: Personal Voice Element
**Source**: Storytelling + Differentiation Architects

The single most differentiating element. Transforms generic content into local expertise.

| DO | DON'T |
|----|-------|
| "Toms gobble here til mid-May" | "Experience world-class turkey hunting" |
| "Fish the coves after a rain" | "Great fishing opportunities" |
| "Best after first frost" | "Perfect fall destination" |

```tsx
{adventure.data.kim_hook && (
  <p className="font-hand text-brand-orange text-sm italic line-clamp-1">
    "{adventure.data.kim_hook}"
  </p>
)}
```

**Schema Addition**:
```yaml
kim_hook: "Toms gobble here til mid-May"  # Kim's personal note
```

---

### 3. FIELD-FIRST INFORMATION HIERARCHY
**Source**: Mobile/Field Use Architect

**The 5-Second Scan Priority**:

| Tier | Time | Elements | Load Priority |
|------|------|----------|---------------|
| **1** | 0-2s | Location + Distance + Difficulty | INSTANT (HTML) |
| **2** | 2-4s | Title + "Open Now?" status | FAST |
| **3** | 4+s | Description + Details + Image | DEFERRED |

**Current Problem**: Image loads first, user sees blank for 2-8s on 3G.

**Solution**: Text-first rendering, image last:
```tsx
// Priority: Content ‚Üí Badges ‚Üí Image
<article className="field-card">
  <div className="content-zone">  {/* Renders immediately */}
    <span className="distance">25 min from shop</span>
    <h3>Spring Gobbler Season</h3>
    <span className="difficulty">Moderate</span>
  </div>
  <div className="image-zone">  {/* Loads last */}
    <img loading="lazy" decoding="async" ... />
  </div>
</article>
```

---

### 4. HUNTER TERMINOLOGY FOR SEASONS
**Source**: Storytelling + Differentiation Architects

Replace generic seasons with Kim's language:

| Generic | WVWO Voice |
|---------|------------|
| Spring | "Spring Gobbler" / "Trout Stocking" |
| Summer | "Bass Season" / "Catfish Nights" |
| Fall | "Buck Season" / "Archery" / "Bear" |
| Winter | "Late Season" |

```tsx
// Instead of: [Spring] [Fall]
// Show: [Spring Gobbler] [Buck Season]
<span className="season-chip">Spring Gobbler</span>
```

---

### 5. CONSISTENT VISUAL ZONES
**Source**: Information Architect

Fixed positions create "scan once, know forever" patterns:

```
+------------------------------------------------------------------+
| IMAGE ZONE                                                        |
|   [SEASONS] bottom-left          [DIFFICULTY] top-right          |
+------------------------------------------------------------------+
| CONTENT ZONE                                                      |
|   Line 1: Distance + Type badge                                   |
|   Line 2-3: Title (line-clamp-2)                                 |
|   Line 4: Kim's Hook (italic, orange)                            |
|   Line 5: Activity icons (max 4)                                 |
|   Line 6: Suitability badges (if present)                        |
+------------------------------------------------------------------+
```

---

## Anti-Patterns to Avoid (Never Do This)

### Visual Anti-Patterns
- ‚ùå Gradient overlays on images
- ‚ùå rounded-lg corners (use rounded-sm)
- ‚ùå shadow-2xl floating cards
- ‚ùå Inter/Poppins/system fonts
- ‚ùå Purple/neon accents
- ‚ùå Stock photos of models in gear

### Voice Anti-Patterns
- ‚ùå "Experience world-class hunting"
- ‚ùå "Discover adventure awaits"
- ‚ùå "Perfect for outdoor enthusiasts"
- ‚ùå "Create lasting memories"

### Platform Anti-Patterns
- ‚ùå Star ratings (AllTrails pattern)
- ‚ùå User-generated reviews (Yelp pattern)
- ‚ùå "Trending" badges (generic platform pattern)
- ‚ùå Corporate color-coding systems

---

## Updated Schema Requirements

```yaml
# Adventure content schema additions
title: "Spring Gobbler Season at Burnsville Lake WMA"
description: "..."  # Standard description

# NEW FIELDS (Swarm consensus)
kim_hook: "Toms gobble here til mid-May"     # Kim's personal note
drive_time: "25 min"                          # From shop coordinates
season_display:                               # Hunter terminology
  - "Spring Gobbler"
  - "Buck Season"
type: "wma"                                   # wma | lake | river | trail
kim_favorite: true                            # For "Kim's Picks" filter
```

## Implementation Priority

| Priority | Enhancement | Effort | Impact |
|----------|-------------|--------|--------|
| **P1** | Drive time from shop | Medium | High (conversion) |
| **P2** | Kim's Hook field + display | Low | High (differentiation) |
| **P3** | Hunter terminology seasons | Low | Medium (voice) |
| **P4** | Field-first load order | Medium | Medium (mobile UX) |
| **P5** | Stagger animation | Low | Low (polish) |
